patterns: What are the micro specializations offered?
Tell me about the micro specializations available
What micro specializations can I choose from?
responses: IIT Jammu offers the following micro specializations under UG Program: Microelectronics and VLSI Design (2022 Scheme), Tunnel Engineering (2022 Scheme).

patterns: What are the minor specializations available?
Tell me about the minor specializations offered
What minor specializations can I choose from?
responses: The following minor specializations are available: Economics (2022 Scheme), Entrepreneurship and Start-up (2022 Scheme), Bioengineering, Mathematics (2019 Scheme), Nuclear Engineering, Engineering and Scientific Computation, CSE (2019 Scheme).

patterns: Tell me about the UG 2022 Curriculum
What is the course offering framework for UG 2022?
Give me the details about UG 2022 curriculum
responses: The UG Program follows the 'UG 2022 Curriculum' as the course offering framework.

patterns: What courses are offered in the core and elective categories?
Tell me about core and elective courses in each department
What are the core and elective courses in different departments?
responses: Each department offers Core Courses and Elective courses. The departments involved are: Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Materials Engineering, Mathematics and Computing, Mechanical Engineering, Chemistry, Physics, Humanities and Social Sciences.

patterns: What are the credit earning courses?
Tell me about credit earning courses in the UG program
What are the core courses that earn credits?
responses: The Core Courses are considered Credit Earning Courses (IC) in the UG Program.

patterns: What is the Design Innovation and Practicum course?
Tell me about the Design Innovation and Practicum in the UG program
What courses are included under Design Innovation and Practicum?
responses: The Design Innovation and Practicum (IC) is part of the Core Courses in the UG Program.

patterns: What are the Engineering Foundation courses?
Tell me about Engineering Foundation courses in the UG program
What courses are included under Engineering Foundation?
responses: The Engineering Foundation courses (IC) are part of the Core Courses in the UG Program.

patterns: What are the Environment courses?
Tell me about the Environment courses in the UG program
What courses are included under the Environment category?
responses: The Environment courses (IC) are part of the Core Courses in the UG Program.
